mapper.insert: insert into test_status (test_id, student_id, status, solved, correct, flagged, score, updated_date) values(${test.id}, ${student.id}, '${requestType}', ${test.solvedCount}, ${test.correctCount}, ${test.flaggedCount}, ${test.score}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: update test_status set solved = ${test.solvedCount}, correct = ${test.correctCount}, score = ${test.score} where test_id = ${test.id} AND student_id = ${student.id}
update test_result set marks = ${marks} where test_id = ${test} AND student_id = ${student} AND question_id = ${question}
mapper.insert: insert into test_result (marks, test_id, student_id, question_id, option_selected, flagged) values(${marks}, ${test}, ${student}, ${question}, '${answered}', ${flagged})

insert into test (test_name, no_of_questions, total_marks, duration, status, institute_id, package_id, created_date, start_date, end_date, test_ui, show_result) values ('${test.name}', ${noOfQuestions}, ${totalMarks} , ${duration}, 'Active', ${student.currentPackage.institute.id}, ${student.currentPackage.id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '${test.startDate}', '${test.endDate}', '${test.testUi}', 'Y')
